artist: Pat Hui; Text by Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; roughly diagonal bands of color with white--purples, red, greens, blues
medium: Watercolor and metallic ink pen on paper
title: Who says drifting alone is not pitiful, from a set of 24 poems
